item.title: Reject the alternative vote (AV) system
item.author: David Oliver,
item.description: If you want to make Nick Clegg’s day because he is your favourite politician then vote YES to the Alternative Vote (AV). Or you can choose to reject this “miserable little compromise” (to quote Mr Clegg) as the political stitch-up it is. Why you should vote no to AV: 1) Almost every …
